body_html: Your bug is in the google::protobuf::ShutdownProtobufLibrary(); routine . From the Screenshot you published you can see that the segfault occurs after the probability calculation is run and shows the line "with probability : " , thus I recommend you debug the program with GDB to make sure the segfault occurs at the ShutdownProtobufLibrary() routine .
